name: Wonders of Life
description:
Don't forget to unzip the file before playing! This game has been made for Mağara Jam (#3) in 72 hours. Please mention the developers in the game credits before playing if you are a streamer. Hoomans explanation: Hoomans target the closest tree and cut it. When they cut a tree, they gain some wood which lets them build. Gameplay video is down below (Includes spoilers).

Join us while we explore The System with our company,  CEV. Let's see what The System capable of.

Team

Arda Karaköz - Sj  (Game Developer - Technical Artist)
Güven Gürünlü - Gwen  (3D Artist - Animator)
Ali Ege Zabcı - zyve  (2D Artist - Game Developer)
Mustafa Kılıç - Prototip (Game Designer)

Controls

In the first stage:
Left click  - Give food.

In the second stage:
WASD  - Change camera positioning.
Scroll - Zoom in or out.
Left click - Pick and spawn animal.
1,2,3 -  Change selected animal .

Instructions (Includes Spoilers)

Stage one: Eat food, get bigger and be careful about other creatures.
Stage two: Destroy all humanity.

Assets

Some sounds used from Madrooster Sound Library (Jam sponsor) and zapsplat.com.
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/stylized-water-for-urp-162025
https://freemusicarchive.org/music/gotama/moving-silence/all-of-this-is-love
https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-sound-effects-download/book-238
